employee_id.title: Employee ID
employee_id.description: ID of the employee, used as a reference in pitFM and Active Directory. Should contain digits only.

description*.en: ID of the employee, used as a reference in pitFM and Active Directory. Should contain digits only.
description*.de: Mitarbeiter-ID, die als Referenz in pitFM und Active Directory verwendet wird. Sollte nur Ziffern enthalten.
